chain_mail.name: Chain Mail
chain_mail.description: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows.

longsword.name: Longsword
longsword.description: A versatile weapon that can be used with one or two hands.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand.

leather_armor.name: Leather Armor
leather_armor.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil.

shortsword.name: Shortsword
shortsword.description: A light, finesse weapon perfect for quick strikes.

thieves_tools.name: Thieves' Tools
thieves_tools.description: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers.

scale_mail.name: Scale Mail
scale_mail.description: This armor consists of a coat and leggings (and perhaps a separate skirt) of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal.

mace.name: Mace
mace.description: A simple weapon with a heavy head on a handle, effective against armor.

holy_symbol.name: Holy Symbol
holy_symbol.description: A holy symbol is a representation of a god or pantheon. A cleric or paladin can use a holy symbol as a spellcasting focus.

quarterstaff.name: Quarterstaff
quarterstaff.description: A quarterstaff is a simple weapon that can be used with one or two hands.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: A simple, versatile weapon that can be thrown or used in melee.

spellbook.name: Spellbook
spellbook.description: Essential for wizards, a spellbook is a leather-bound tome with 100 blank vellum pages suitable for recording spells.

component_pouch.name: Component Pouch
component_pouch.description: A component pouch is a small, watertight leather belt pouch that has compartments to hold all the material components and other special items you need to cast your spells.

leather_boots.name: Leather Boots
leather_boots.description: Sturdy leather boots that protect your feet.

leather_gloves.name: Leather Gloves
leather_gloves.description: Flexible leather gloves that provide grip and protection.

iron_helmet.name: Iron Helmet
iron_helmet.description: A sturdy iron helmet that protects your head.

gold_amulet.name: Gold Amulet
gold_amulet.description: A beautiful gold amulet worn around the neck.

ring_of_protection.name: Ring of Protection
ring_of_protection.description: A magical ring that provides +1 AC and +1 to saving throws.

gauntlets_of_ogre_power.name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
gauntlets_of_ogre_power.description: These gauntlets set your Strength score to 19 while worn.

headband_of_intellect.name: Headband of Intellect
headband_of_intellect.description: This headband sets your Intelligence score to 19 while worn.

amulet_of_health.name: Amulet of Health
amulet_of_health.description: This amulet sets your Constitution score to 19 while worn.

magic_sword_plus_1.name: Magic Sword +1
magic_sword_plus_1.description: A magical longsword with a +1 enhancement bonus to attack and damage rolls.

magic_armor_plus_1.name: Magic Leather Armor +1
magic_armor_plus_1.description: Magical leather armor with a +1 enhancement bonus to AC.

greatsword.name: Greatsword
greatsword.description: A massive two-handed sword that deals devastating damage.

greataxe.name: Greataxe
greataxe.description: A large, two-handed axe favored by barbarians.

longbow.name: Longbow
longbow.description: A tall bow that requires both hands to use effectively.

heavy_crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
heavy_crossbow.description: A powerful crossbow that requires both hands to operate.

healing_potion.name: Potion of Healing
healing_potion.description: A magical red liquid that restores 2d4+2 hit points when consumed.

mana_potion.name: Potion of Mana
mana_potion.description: A shimmering blue potion that restores spell slots when consumed.

antidote.name: Antidote
antidote.description: A bitter green liquid that neutralizes poison when consumed.

rations.name: Trail Rations
rations.description: Dried food that provides sustenance for one day.

arrows.name: Arrows
arrows.description: Standard arrows for bows. Sold in bundles of 20.

crossbow_bolts.name: Crossbow Bolts
crossbow_bolts.description: Standard bolts for crossbows. Sold in bundles of 20.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A wooden torch that provides light for 1 hour when lit.

spell_components.name: Spell Components
spell_components.description: Various magical components used for spellcasting.

backpack.name: Backpack
backpack.description: A sturdy leather backpack that increases carrying capacity by 30 lbs.

large_backpack.name: Large Backpack
large_backpack.description: A large, reinforced backpack that increases carrying capacity by 50 lbs.

satchel.name: Satchel
satchel.description: A small leather satchel that increases carrying capacity by 10 lbs.

belt_pouch.name: Belt Pouch
belt_pouch.description: A small belt pouch that increases carrying capacity by 5 lbs.

bag_of_holding.name: Bag of Holding
bag_of_holding.description: A magical bag that creates an extradimensional space, increasing carrying capacity by 500 lbs.
